Ouch.. you're right..  I have hierarchy of test cases that extend 
the functionality of a common super test case, and they instantiate 
the object I'm testing via reflection.  Can anyone give me a short 
and sweet example of how to use Junit's classloader?  I knew Junit 
had a custom classloader and that my problem was loading classes, 
just never put two and two together.

Thanx!
